amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 118-511 to require the nationality of an illegal alien to be reported on, once they have exposed a law enforcement officer to fentanyl during an encounter at the border and in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaLota amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaLota amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
